DOC.detailed_description: The study protocol comprise 5 visit : baseline , month 3 , month 6 , month 9 , month 12 . At baseline clinical evaluator perform complete ophthalmologic evaluation confirm diagnosis . The following examination do follow sequence : anterior segment examination , Shirmer test , Break-up time test . Thereafter , confocal evaluator perform confocal microscopy central peripheral cornea . Finally , contact measurement do follow order : IOP ( measure 3 pm ) , pachimetry ( baseline visit ) gonioscony ( baseline visit ) . A 15 minute interval elapse two consecutive test .
